page.title: 15Village Life
page.content: Some musical entertainment organised in the churches, concerts on Belchamp Ottens organ which is played regularly by a local composer, and mixed musical entertainment in Belchamp Walter.Also Carol Services, Harvest Festivals etc well attended. Local events include village weddings and funerals, church fetes and other church fund raising events such as jumble sales, harvest suppers etc. There are also regular Horse Shows held at Eyston Hall and this year a steam rally, and display of old farm machinery. Belchamp Walter Eight Bells so called because of the 8 bells at the church, is very much a centre of village life especially as the Post Office is run in the pub. The pub serves meals, & has a darts team & pool team.
